modifications: Documented steps for triggering GitHub Actions deployment
Included verification checklist for deployment process
Added detailed notes about deployment workflow

patterns_discovered: Automated deployment workflow using GitHub Actions
Manual and automatic deployment trigger options
gotchas_discovered: User must manually verify/add secrets in GitHub Settings
Workflow can fail due to authentication, build, or project configuration issues
Requires manual intervention to create PR and merge
recommendations: Verify GitHub Secrets configuration before deployment
Test build process locally before triggering workflow
Confirm Cloudflare Pages project exists and is correctly configured
Use manual workflow dispatch as backup deployment method
